author: TravelandLearn_11
title: Great location and lovely service
text:
I loved the central location of this hotel, and was treated to a nice room on the top 31st floor. The ground floor lobby is just a check-in desk, the more spacious lobby is on the 12th floor. Friendly service. Would stay here again.
Room Tip: Top floors are somewhat quieter (NYC is always noisy!) See more room tips
